description: Removed BugReportButton from Header and MobileNavigation components to streamline the interface.
Introduced secondary sidebar for prompts in MobileNavigation, allowing users to access additional options without cluttering the main menu.
Updated DashboardNavigation to include a dropdown menu for better organization of navigation links, including a support option.
Changed AboutMobileNav navigation list from flex layout to grid layout for better organization of nav items.
Removed AboutSidebar component from the About page to simplify the layout and eliminate redundant navigation links.
Updated AboutSidebar component structure and navigation handling to improve organization.
